group_1.textRight: *Sigh*

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Kaede... @What's the matter?
I’ll lend you an ear if you’d like.

group_1.textRight: Lemme guess, you’re fussing about snake food @or something dumb like that.

group_1.textLeft: Pero’s food is important!
...I mean, I've just been having trouble @with a favor!
Karin asked me to be an art model for her...
She said I needed to wear a Christmas outfit.
Really? That’s very out of season.

group_1.textRight: Exactly. I can’t find anything anywhere.
I'll need it by tomorrow, but...

group_1.textLeft: Then perhaps I may be of some assistance.
I think I can loan one of the Christmas costumes @from the maid cafe.

group_1.textRight: R-really?!

group_1.textLeft: But they belong to the cafe, so I can't say @that it'll be free of charge.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: Exactly...
So why not pay your dues by working as a @maid for a day?

group_1.textRight: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wh-what?! @Her, working as a maid?
There’s absolutely no way you can do that!

group_1.textLeft: I-I can give it a try, but the idea of waiting @on customers is… Oh, man...
Hello, I’m looking forward to working with @you all, today!

group_1.textRight: Very good, let’s go over here and get you @dressed.

group_1.textLeft: Um, so I put it on, and it’s...

group_1.textRight: Yes, this is the costume I was planning on lending @you. That should get you in a festive spirit, no?

group_1.textLeft: Y-you're right, Kanagi!

group_1.textRight: No, in this environment, you will call me @Nagitan.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes! I will, Nagitan!

group_1.textRight: Alright, let’s begin with the basics... [chara:101602:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101602:cheek_0][chara:101602:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101602:motion_300][chara:101602:lipSynch_1]because @my interpretation seems to be very unique.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I’ve already gotten some pointers.
Karin and Ikumi gave me some advice!

group_1.textRight: Hm, I’m impressed.
First, you must immediately greet your @masters.
Let’s see what you can do, Akino.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes!
W-welcome home, Mash-[chara:101152:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101152:cheek_1][chara:101152:face_mtn_ex_060.exp.json][chara:101152:lipSynch_1][chara:101152:effect_shake]ter?!
(Oh, no... I bit my tongue…)

group_1.textRight: Ah...

group_1.textLeft: Huh…?

group_1.textCenter: (They should be about to wrap up…)
(If Kaede ended up failing and crying, @I’ll feel awful…)
(...Um, just kidding! @If she cries about it, I'm gonna laugh at her.)
(Jeez, what the hell was I thinking just then…?)

group_1.textRight: You drew a... snake on my omelet?

group_1.textLeft: M-maybe… Could it be that you don’t like it…?

group_1.textRight: It’s not what I expected, but it’s really cute!

group_1.textLeft: Ack?! [chara:101152:effect_shake]Oh n-no, I spilled some water on @you...
I-I’m really, really sorry...

group_1.textRight: Don't cry, Kae-pyon! You're doing great! @Keep going!
Kae-pyon! Serve me next!

group_1.textLeft: Uh, uhm...K-K-Kae-p-pyon...?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:800200:effect_shake]Argh...she’s too precious...

group_1.textLeft: M-master?!

group_1.textCenter: (W-well, the "helpless moe-blob" archetype @is popular with idol fans for sure, but...)

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Is that you, Rena?

group_1.textRight: I-I came here to see how badly you were gonna @screw this up!

group_1.textLeft: Ugh! You’re always so mean~

group_1.textRight: Ah, Minami, you came here because you @were worried about her, weren’t you?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]No…! It’s not like I was worried or anything…!

group_1.textRight: I can't believe she showed up just as you were @about to wrap up. That's a sign of a good friend.
Now, even though you were only here @for one day, you did a fabulous job~♪
So that means you get to keep that costume, @Kae-pyon!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?! B-but...

group_1.textRight: So, once you get to high school, @you need to come work for us~♪
Yes, we’d be more than delighted to have you @here.

group_1.textLeft: I-I don’t think I could...

group_1.textRight: Minami, what do you think of Akino’s @performance as a maid today?
Ah...I-I guess that wasn’t so bad coming @from you, Kaede!

group_1.textLeft: D-do you really mean it, Rena?!

group_1.textRight: Duh! I wouldn’t bother lying to you!
Very good. Thank you for all of your hard @work today, Kae-pyon.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101152:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes! Thank you so much! @Nagitan! Madam!
